content: The Adulterous Woman
But Jesus went to the Mount of Olives.
And early in the morning He came again into the temple , and all the people were coming to Him; and He sat down and  teaching them.
Now the scribes and the Pharisees *brought a woman caught in the act of adultery, and after placing her in the center ,
they *said to Him, “Teacher, this woman has been caught in the very act of committing adultery.
Now in the Law, Moses commanded us to stone such women; what then do You say?”
Now they were saying this to test Him, so that they might have  accusing Him. But Jesus stooped down and with His finger wrote on the ground.
When they persisted in asking Him, He straightened up and said to them,
And again He stooped down and wrote on the ground.
Now when they heard , they  leaving, one by one, beginning with the older ones, and He was left alone, and the woman  was, in the center .
And straightening up, Jesus said to her,
She said, “No one, Lord.” And Jesus said, ]]
Jesus Is the Light of the World
Then Jesus again spoke to them, saying,
So the Pharisees said to Him, “You are testifying about Yourself; Your testimony is not true.”
Jesus answered and said to them,
So they were saying to Him, “Where is Your Father?” Jesus answered,
These words He spoke in the treasury, as He taught in the temple ; and no one arrested Him, because His hour had not yet come.
Then He said again to them,
So the Jews were saying, “Surely He will not kill Himself, will He, since He says, ?”
And He was saying to them,
Then they were saying to Him, “Who are You?” Jesus said to them,
They did not realize that He was speaking to them  the Father.
So Jesus said,
As He said these things, many came to believe in Him.
The Truth Will Set You Free
So Jesus was saying to those Jews who had believed Him,
They answered Him, “We are Abraham’s descendants and have never been enslaved to anyone; how  You say, ?”
Jesus answered them,
They answered and said to Him, “Abraham is our father.” Jesus *said to them,  They said to Him, “We were not born as a result of sexual immorality; we have one Father: God.”
Jesus said to them,
The Jews answered and said to Him, “Do we not rightly say that You are a Samaritan, and You have a demon?”
Jesus answered,
The Jews said to Him, “Now we know that You have a demon. Abraham died, and the prophets ; and  You say,
You are not greater than our father Abraham, who died, are You? The prophets died too. Whom do You make Yourself ?”
Jesus answered,
So the Jews said to Him, “You are not yet fifty years old, and You have seen Abraham?”
Jesus said to them,
Therefore they picked up stones to throw at Him, but Jesus hid Himself and left the temple .
